Uses of Class
com.telesign.verify.response.VerifyResponse

  • Packages that use VerifyResponse 
    Package Description
    com.telesign.verify
    Contains the Verify class, which abstracts calls to the TeleSign Verify Web Service.

    • Uses of VerifyResponse in com.telesign.verify

      Methods in com.telesign.verify that return VerifyResponse 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      VerifyResponse Verify.call(String phone_number)
      Delivers a verification code to the end user with a phone call.
      VerifyResponse Verify.call(String phone_number, String language)
      Delivers a verification code to the end user with a phone call.
      VerifyResponse Verify.call(String phone_number, String language, String verify_code, String verify_method, int extension_type, String extension_template, boolean redial)
      Delivers a verification code to the end user with a phone call.
      VerifyResponse Verify.sms(String identifier)
      Delivers a verification code to the end user by sending it in a text message.
      VerifyResponse Verify.sms(String identifier, String language)
      Delivers a verification code to the end user by sending it in a text message.
      VerifyResponse Verify.sms(String identifier, String language, String verify_code, String template)
      Delivers a verification code to the end user by sending it in a text message.
      VerifyResponse Verify.status(String resource_id)
      Retrieves the status of a phone verification (for either SMS or Call).
